titleStmt.title: Good conscience: or a treatise shewing the nature, meanes, marks, benefit, and necessitie thereof. By Ier: Dyke; minister of Gods word at Epping in Essex..
titleStmt.author: Dyke, Jeremiah, 1584-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Milbourne, and are to be sold at his Shop, at the great South-dore of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A-Y⁸ (first and last leaves blank).
Imperfect: stained, torn, faded, and with broken type, resulting in loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.

place.placeName: his Shop, at the great South-dore of Pauls.
